website_summaries.verdict: Boasting all the features and comfort of more expensive options, this pack of 2 memory foam pillows delivers unbeatable value for budget-conscious buyers.
pros: A combination of shredded memory foam and poly-fiber offers a blend of comfort and support while allowing air to circulate
Loft is easy to adjust by removing or adding foam
Bamboo/polyester cover is naturally hypoallergenic and dust mite resistant
Fully machine washable and dryer safe
cons: Comes with the typical memory foam smell and needs to be aired before using

customer_reviews.title: Stinks!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these pillows for several days now, and they still smell. I walked into my bedroom after leaving them to air out all day, and instead my entire room stunk. I've since put them in the garage and have left them there for a couple days. Unfortunately the smell still hasn't gone away. I'll give it another day or two, but intend to return them if it doesn't go away soon.
customer_reviews.author: JMPortland

customer_reviews.title: USED PILLOWS
customer_reviews.text: I got these pillows yesterday. Unsealed, clearly used. They are stained and smell disgusting. The package says to take out of plastic but they weren’t in plastic. When I opened up the zipper to the pillows the foam pillow was crumbling. And they weren’t even king size. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Good pillows
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like that I was being offered a $10 gift card to rate the pillows a five out of five. Seems shady. I like th pillows they are great for the price. One of the cases did snag and the cases may pill but no biggie. All around wonderful pillows for he price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Why so many 5 star reviews!!!
customer_reviews.text: Why does this god awful pillow have so many 5 star reviews! This has got to be the most uncomfortable pillow I've ever slept on! Never had so much neck pain in the morning! Thankfully it is easy to return things to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MyDixieWrecked

customer_reviews.title: Worst pillow I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: These are the most God awful pillows I have ever slept on. I have tried removing foam a bit at a time; reading foam; removing again, fluffing them re-positioning them, nothing works as they are simply terrible. The material is like lumps of ground up mattress foam that clumps together and causes mounds and lumps all through the pillow. I hate them with a passion; they make my neck hurt; they make me wake up with a headache....if I could give them negative stars I would. All these positive reviews these people must have gotten a different pillow than I did
customer_reviews.author: Breanna S.

customer_reviews.title: I bought them very expensive buy somehow my old pillows are better than these at half price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using them for a month and they don't hold their shape at all, I bought them very expensive buy somehow my old pillows are better than these at half price, I would not recommend if you are looking for pillows to hold their shape give you comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Ankit Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable! Love the pillow. Just can not get rid of smell in the foam.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pillow to help with my back pain, loved that it was 2 for the price of 1 my pillow. It assisted in the recovery of my back along with other support. I enjoy that this pillow has adjustable foam inside so I can stuff more foam to one side because I like to sleep on all side. I like one side high to sleep on my side, and one side low to sleep on back or stomach. This pillow was perfect for that, love that is also has a removable washable cover. I can not get rid of the smell from the foam though so that is why I only give 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very lumpy and a lot softer than I thought it would be. Offers almost no support unless you practically fold it in half. Tried putting it in the dryer to fluff it up, but it didn’t make much of a difference. It was just floppy AND warm. Did not fill up my standard sized pillow case. It almost falls out of the case on a daily basis. I keep having to pull the pillowcase over it because it’s half sticking out. Tempur-Pedic is having a BOGO sale on pillows today, so I bought 2 from them tonight and I’m not sure what I’m going to do with these.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Beltran

customer_reviews.title: Believe the bad reviews. This is horrible.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to ignore the reviews that talked about the horrible smell. Big mistake. I aired these pillows out for 2 weeks, and the toxic, chemical, petroleum smell still was overwhelming. The smell even permeated the entire bedroom. These should be outlawed.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.text: The WonderSleep pillows are very substantial and feels firm yet conforms to the shape of your head, neck and shoulders. Filled with finely shredded memory foam and wrapped within two pillow cases. The construction quality is excellent. It has taken me several nights to adjust to the pillows. Seems that I don’t move around as much because the pillow supports my head so well. I was using two pillows to get the support I needed. With the WonderSleep pillow I now only need one pillow. You may want to only purchase one pillow for each person.
customer_reviews.author: Luca

customer_reviews.title: Best Pillow Ever
customer_reviews.text: We've had "My Pillow" for over 5 years now and usually take it with us when traveling. We FORGOT our pillows behind and when we returned home, I found these pillows that had great reviews. I can tell you that the value is excellent. Comparing to our previous favorite pillows, My Pillow, these are half the price of just one! and they have much smaller pieces inside so that the texture is wonderfully soft. The pillow cases are doubled, so that you can remove the outer to wash more frequently, and you can remove or add stuffing on the inside liner to make it just perfect for you! We just found our new favorite pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the first four months then flat (REVISED)
customer_reviews.text: Update: The company reached out, shared they are working on the pillow to improve it in newest iterations, and they offered a refund and gift card. I was very impressed by the customer service and care. I would consider one in the future. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ This pillow is great, for about four months. The support is amazing and firm. Then, it goes flat. You follow the directions provided, stays up for one week, and then back to flat. It’s frustrating because when it’s new, it’s great. But then it’s done. I’ve bought a second pillow: same issue. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Spartan Chad

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Pillow -- Seriously, buy anything else...
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are terrible. First of all, when you get them, they stink. We aired them out and washed them multiple times over a period of a week before we even tried sleeping on them and even then they still had a chemical smell. They offer no support; the shredded pieces basically clump together so you wake up with your head flat the the shredded pieces all pushed up to the top and sides of the pillow. We consider these a complete loss and have since purchased new pillows (that cost A LOT less) that are much better.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: STINKY, but comfortable Pillow - but still not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this, and followed the seller's instructions.... For one pillow, i aired it out all day in the sun (10 hours), and it still smelled like a Marks-Alot Permanent marker... VERY FOUL SMELL. Then, i proceeded to put it in the dryer as they instructed and even added 3 very good smelling drying sheets... still stinks. For the second pillow, i just ran it through the dryer with dryer sheets TWICE.... still smells awful. There's nothing i can do to get this horrible PERMANENT MARKER smell out of my pillows. Would never buy these again.... Aside from the comfort of the pillows... i'd never buy these or recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Dashing

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but smells horrible!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the pillow feels and looks great, but you can’t sleep or even sit next to them because the smell is off putting. I read the reviews and I tried taking some of the stuffing out, placing them in the dry, hell I even put dryer sheets within the pillow casing, but that smell isn’t going away. Please save your money and order a different product. If the pillow is comfortable, but you can’t stand to be near it, it isn’t worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t slept on them yet but......
customer_reviews.text: So I’m writing this review on the first day. That I recived them I haven’t slept in them yet. But I will update my review once I do. But before that, I bought two different ones to see which one is better. Also I bought Allersoft all-cotton covers just so then i don’t have to wash the foam(cause I don’t think you can). I bought two of wondersleep and one original bamboo pillow and there’s a pretty big difference between them. The one that’s all messy is the “original bamboo pillow” and the one that has all the white pieces is the “wonder pillow” but I haven’t slept in either yet so I will update soon.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin G.

customer_reviews.title: Best.Pillow.Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Too big, its always inflating outside of the standard pillow case. They look awful and there's no way to deter the effect.
customer_reviews.author: NewEnglandMan22

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not so cheerful
customer_reviews.text: Gigantic lumpy pillows. I was trying to replace my old down pillows with something more economical and won’t make that mistake again. Not for anyone who has previously enjoyed high quality bedding. No clue how to return them as they are far too big to fit into a normal box, much less the packaging in which they arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holy mother of smell!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What is in these pillows that make them smell so HORRIBLE? I have already had them in the dryer 3 times and the smell wasn't knocked down at ALL. I SO regret buying these. They smell like what you imagine a toxic waste dump smells like. I seriously do not believe that even 8 hours in sunlight would touch this odor. Going back to a MyPillow and should have never tried these!! Also, they are super firm and would definitely hurt my neck. I think the FDA needs to be alerted and I would NOT recommend these for kids - ever.
customer_reviews.author: H. Pridmore

customer_reviews.title: I just got this today... when I ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today... when I am about to place it in my new cover I noticed the seams are broken!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Smell
customer_reviews.text: The product descriptions says to place is the dryer or put outside to air out the smell. I can tell you that after 4 days in the hot 85 degree air/sun, 4 times in the dryer for 40+ min each time, and even washing then drying, the chemical smell is still in the pillow. It gave me a headache within hours of having it near me.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t suggest them to my friends
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pillows after reading many reviews. I’ve had them for >1month and I should say that I didn’t get what I was expecting. The pillows come filled with A LOT of foam so, as you have probably read, have to remove some to make they pillow kinda comfortable. What happens though is that you can never have the right amount of foam in the pillow. It’s either too full or too empty. I’ve re-filled it more than 5 times so far and, still, doesn’t fill comfortable. It maybe be something that I’m doing wrong but I would not suggest them to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Vasili

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Ok I've been using these pillows for almost a month and kept hoping I would love it. I wanted to love them. They fluffed up immediately and seemed very comfortable after adjusting the amount of fill, but within a few days I found myself sleeping very poorly and frustrated constantly trying to find a comfortable position. I just find them lumpy and unsupportive and my neck is hurting more than usual. Very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kaeldra1

customer_reviews.title: Great pillows, awesome price, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are great. Very soft and adjustable, the filling is shredded foam so you are able to fluff them to your personal taste. They arrive vacuum packed and rolled up inside a tube. After opening and letting them air out they fluff up. They did have an odor upon removing from packaging, nothing too bad, I noticed it less and less per night, after a few days it was unnoticeable. Might vary depending on your sensitivity to smell. For the price I paid I would definitely buy again, our last memory foam pillows cost $100 when we purchased our mattress, definitely got ripped off. These are just as good.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Soooo stinky!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these more than two weeks go. Other reviews mentioned the chemical smell. My word it is bad. I have ran the pillows through the dryer over and over but they still smell terrible. I would describe it similar to the smell of oven cleaner. I am still waiting to get to try these. Also after going through the dryer so many times the pillows are ridiculously plump.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Pillow you’ll love
customer_reviews.text: I have a very sensitive neck. If I sleep on a pillow other than mine own it’s almost clockwork I’ll have a tension headache. My old memory foam was wearing out after several years so I started the hunt for a new one. After reading reviews and price, I gave this brand a try. I’m impressed. Comfortable, supportive, and no neck pain. I ended up replacing all pillows in my house w these and ordered them for my parents as well. I’ve found my forever pillow brand
customer_reviews.author: Bretton

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I've tried all kinds of memory foams and this is by far the best one. Been using it for over a month and love it. I prefer a firm pillow, and this worked for me. Placed in the dryer to fluff up and didn't have to remove any stuffing. My partner prefers a softer pillow, so she removed some of the stuffing from hers and we both love them. It goes a little flat with use, but I just punch it and fluff it up before bed each night and it quickly regains it's shape. Would buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: A. L. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding pillows
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these thinking they would be just like all the others I have purchased over the years. I was wrong. These pillows are amazing. They are full of memory foam and don't go flat. You even have the option to pull some of the foam out to make them a little smaller or less firm. They do stay cool as advertised. I am very impressed and will recommend these to friends. As others have noticed there is a slight smell that comes from the foam. Put the pillows in the dryer on low heat for a bit and that will go away.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Beranek

customer_reviews.title: Finally, after all of these years
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'2" tall broad shouldered and always sleep on my side because of 4 herniated cervical dics. I wasted so much money on pillows (never firm enough for side lying), I finally made my own using old toppers and cutting them into rectangles. The problem was my created pillows weighed like 15 lbs each. These pillows are excellent for me and in case the firmness wears down, it is a great option with the zipper to add or remove fill. So if you are like me, save your old pillows in case you need to add fill down the line.
customer_reviews.author: Misudfr

customer_reviews.title: Pillows are not as reviews state
customer_reviews.text: Delivered compressed in two small cans. After opening they expand but have a gas smell that took a week to get to where I could use. I even tried the dryer trick someone else posted. The previous reviews said better than "My Pillow" not even close, way to hard, gave me stiff neck. Now that they are 10x the size of delivered not sure how to return...This review was not bought by the company as many of the previous 5 star reviews received gift cards.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D Potter

customer_reviews.title: very happy with this pillow
customer_reviews.text: takes 2-3 tries to get the filling amount right. if you never slept on memory foam before, keep in mind it's very comfortable, but runs hot. you'll prob wake up with a bit of sweat buildup on the pillow. it's the material, no solution to it, but the sleep comfort is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: roee yaakobi

customer_reviews.title: Not sure after 6 months' use
customer_reviews.text: The pillows come very thick and firm, which you can alter by removing some stuffing material; however, that process is a MESS. Plus it took multiple adjustments (read: messes) to get to the size and fitness I preferred. I've used them for about 6 months, and they seem to be compressed quite a bit already.
customer_reviews.author: patmatt56

customer_reviews.title: The best pillows I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pillows several months ago and since then me and my partner only need one each instead of the 2 to 3 we were using before filled with stuffing. The memory foam is so stiff and amazing, you can definitely get a gallon ziplock bag and remove some foam from the pillow to adjust to your liking. Comes with a nice protective cover, and how its shipped is convenient. Makes an excellent christmad gift! I cant say enough nice things about it, so glad we invested the 40$ instead of going to Walmart and staring at thise overpriced pillows wondering if it will be worth the money. Look no further these pillows are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Average at best
customer_reviews.text: Bought theses because of all the 5 star reviews. These pillows are over priced for the quality they are. These pillows are average at best. The package comes with an offer of $20 for a 5star review on the product which is where all the 5 star reviews come from. I have problems with my neck and was hoping these pillows would provide some support. They’re flat and provide no neck support. Mypillow was better than these
customer_reviews.author: Arie Snider

customer_reviews.title: Wonder-ful pillow
customer_reviews.text: We had purchased MyPillow about 5 years ago and after bi-weekly washings were starting to not be as supportive. I had ordered new MyPillows but swear they changed the density of their foam so I sent them back. After that, I tried 4 different shredded Memory foam pillows on Amazon and they were either too flat or too fluffy this one is perfect! It has the ideal amount of density and height, easily plumps up as necessary. It also has a stay-cool cover to keep your head from overheating at night. Thank you Wondersleep!
customer_reviews.author: CJones22572

customer_reviews.title: It’s a mud pillow
customer_reviews.text: MY PILLOW finally split its seams in the wash. So instead of buying a new one, I saw this pillow. Trust me, MY PILLOW has a different fill than this memory foam mud pillow. When you try to form this pillow to your liking, It slowly returns to its flat and normal state. At least MY PILLOW stays formed to your head. I’m returning this muddy pillow and I’m going to buy a new MY PILLOW.
customer_reviews.author: MARCUS

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: So far this one seems like it will hold up to the hype about this type of pillow. I have tried so many different pillows it’s ridiculous. I tried the “my pillow” what a joke! It was nothing but all different types and sizes of cut up foam and it was not soft or Tempurpedic foam it was lumpy and miserable. I have only had this a couple of weeks but it seems promising. I will write another review in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Go to Walmart no better.
customer_reviews.text: They will just go flat overnight. By morning no support. Ok for a few hours. About as good as a Walmart pillow but it says you can wash them.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Finally... a restful nights sleep
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was a bit skeptical upon seeing the pillows. The pillow’s inserts are made up of several pieces rather than one solid foam like typical pillows. You might think this wouldn’t make for a comfortable rest; however, it’s rather ingenious as it conforms nicely to your head. You also have the ability to adjust using the zippered access. I finally awake without awful neck pain like I was getting with conventional pillows and even with solid piece memory foam pillows. After about three days my head adjusted nicely to the wondersleep pillows and I’ve been sleeping much more soundly. I’ll definitely buy some for rest of family.
customer_reviews.author: Britrock

customer_reviews.title: Works like a normal pillow
customer_reviews.text: The cover is easy to wash. Take it off and throw it in the washer. There is another layer to hold the foam so it doesn't get everywhere. When i first opened it i had to let it sit out to thicken but it didn't thicken much. It did have a chemical smell for a few weeks but it wears off. I put it in the dryer to fluff it up, which i have to do occasionally. I do wake up with lower back pain. I'm thinking it's not too supportive. They are comfy, though.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Landers

customer_reviews.title: The smell is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these pillows for a while now and I really really wanted to love them BUT the smell is just aweful. I did as the direction says; I put the. In the dryer for the time suggested on two seperate occasions as well as left them out in the sun for several hours and still the smell is just terrible. It does seem though that if the smell wasn’t a problem they would be what I am looking for but we cannot sleep on them because of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Jorden

customer_reviews.title: Where were these manufactured, Heaven?!
customer_reviews.text: Where were these manufactured, Heaven?! I'm never getting out of bed again. It just arrived an hour ago so I can't comment on sleep yet. But virtually the moment head touched pillow the ever present desire to remove my head from my shoulders ceased. After my chiro recommended a new pillow and my mom telling me her my pillow is a miracle worker, I sought out something more wallet friendly, crossed my fingers and hoped for the best. Wishes really do come true! Forget expensive Disney vacations, the happiest place on earth is now my bed (which I get generous amounts of time in now, thanks covid!) Buy the thing. BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable sleep
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pillows for my bedroom and have been sleeping without a problem for months! The neck support is firm while not being uncomfortable and I do feel it helps with the alignment of my spine because I'm no longer waking up with back pain either. Regarding packing, the pillows came in tubing that unrolled and fluffed out within 2 days. They did have a slight chemical smell, but I simply sprayed a fabric refresher on them, and I had no problems with scent. All in all, these pillows are definitely worth the money, and I will be buying 2 more for my guest room so friends and family can also enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Memory Foam Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to buy new pillows and read about shredded memory foam pillows. Decided to give this a shot, and its super comfortable! I read the instructions suggesting using a tumble dryer to make it firmer, and it became much bigger. The great thing about this pillow is that you can add or remove pillow filling to the pillow case to make it more or less firm. Being machine washable is definitely a major positive! It will be a lot easier to clean compared to my older memory foam pillow.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: They are somewhat supportive but they don't seem to feel comfortable no matter how I many times I adjust the ...
customer_reviews.text: The reviews aren't what they seem. These pillows are not worth 5 stars. They are somewhat supportive but they don't seem to feel comfortable no matter how I many times I adjust the foam. I will be returning them unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: butterfly13

customer_reviews.title: Firm, but very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the packaging tube, and after allowing to reform to its real shape, this pillow went into a waterproof pillowcase. Even with the pillowcase being aggressive and not the most comfortable, this pillow is exactly what you’d hope for with a memory foam pillow. Soft, contouring, and of course pops right back into shape. As for cooling, my other one does a better job. This very we could be due to the case I have over the pillow, so I won’t dig deeper into it. There’s not much else to really say. This beats a feather pillow every day of the week.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and lumpy
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these pillows but after trying them for over a week I really don't like them. They are two different sizes with different memory foam inside each pillow. They are also lumpy and don't breathe well. They say they are "premium" but I really don't think there is anything premium about these pillows. I don't really know what to do with them. I just want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisP

customer_reviews.title: Best pillows ever and I’ve been through a lot
customer_reviews.text: After at least 5 other pillows ranging from cotton to memory foam I have to say this is my favorite. It’s the perfect amount of soft. It’s been only a week but I feel much more rested and comfortable using these pillows. I use this one on top of a ultra soft memory foam pillow and it’s perfect. My wife also agrees. After 10 years together we both agree these pillows are our favorite. Let’s hope they keep their fluff for many years.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: I love these pillows
customer_reviews.text: These pillows feel so good. I love a firm full pillow because I sit up in bed and I like a good pillow to support my back while I lean back. This pillow is perfect for that. I love that you can adjust the fullness of the pillows. They also feel good when you sleep on them. Forget that "My Pillow" TV commercial guy this is what you are looking for in a pillow- FACTS
customer_reviews.author: Soquaint

customer_reviews.title: You’ll “wonder” how anyone has ever slept on these pillows.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to get some needed support for my neck and back, but then these pillows arrived in the mail. They were brilliantly packaged and shrink wrapped well enough to fit into individual tubes. I should have known right there that no amount of fluffing up would be able to create any amount of structure to these things. Imagine sleeping on a pillow that Salvador Dali painted. If you are looking for more support, try buying a different pillow or getting a life coach. I’m returning these pillows today and going back to sleeping on something more supportive...a packet of sweet and low.
customer_reviews.author: M Branco

customer_reviews.title: The smell....
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for this pillow based on the reviews, but never even got to use it because the smell is so overwhelming. We’ve had them airing out for over a week now and it’s not getting much better. We put them through two dry cycles in the machine, left them in the sun, left them outside for a day... no luck. So now we are returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Bhavna

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It appears that either the quality of these pillows have decreased, or I received two that made their way past quality control. They appear to be half filled and most of that filling is fiber stuffing and not memory foam. I would have to remove the entire contents of one pillow and add it to the other to make it look like a pillow some reviewers have stated were "almost over filled". I am so disappointed in this purchase. I would not recommend these to anyone. I don't know how they have received such high marks, unless like I stated earlier, their quality control has gone on strike. Save yourself a headache and buy a quality pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Emily L Reardon

customer_reviews.title: It's a pillow and it's a nice place to lay my head
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in hopes they would hold up over time and not flatten out. To date they have maintained their shape well. The pillows are more comfortable than a lot of them I have tried over the last year in an effort for a better sleep. I recommend these pillows for their comfort, support, and maintaining fluffiness. The only complaint I have is the outer cover is zippered and the pull part of the zipper is noticeable and a minor irritant when I lay on my side. The pillow is soft but firm enough to not flatten completely out while I am laying on it.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Herder

customer_reviews.title: Fussy husband loves this pillow
customer_reviews.text: My husband who is very particular loves this pillow. I love the 2 for 1 price, quality and comfort. There was no odor in the pillow, just took them out of the packaging and fluffed them in the dryer on cool. My husband has severe arthritis in his neck and shoulders and this pillow gives him relief. When looking for this type of pillow on amazon I saw ones that cost much more. Don’t see why anyone would pay more, this pillow makes us want to go to bed early! We’ve had them for 1 week; if it falls apart months later I’ll update this review by I don’t see why it would fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow but don’t think it is worth it because of the smell
customer_reviews.text: I love the pillow and how heavy yet soft it is. It reminds me a lot of a nice hotel pillow. I can’t however really enjoy it because the foam has a horrible chemical smell that I can even begin to describe! We put the pillows in the dryer, washed our pillow cases and it still won’t go away. I have been waking up with a flushed, red face that seems to be a reaction to whatever is in the pillow. Everything it comes in contact with smells-my hair, our bed, the pillow case, etc. I am really hoping the smells goes away eventually because the pillows are very comfortable otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: HDS

customer_reviews.title: It's adjustable, FINALLY the perfect pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I have FINALLY found my perfect pillow. What I love about the WonderSleep pillow is that's adjustable. The pillow unzips, so if the pillow is to full you can pull out however much of the foam you desire. Also if you want the pillow fuller you can add more chunks of the memory foam. Other great aspects are the nice pillow case, the full life time warranty, and the pillow can be washed and tumble dry. It's 80*/* memory foam chunks, and 20*/* polyester filling so you don't have to worry about the pillow bunching up.
customer_reviews.author: Lori H.

customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: pillows become a big lump and are uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I can not understand how these pillows have such good reviews. I ended up throwing my pillows away they just become lumpy and uncomfortable. Only good thing about them is the removable pillow case I have had for about 45 days now thought give them a chance. You can ajust the firmness by adding and subtracting the shredded foam. customer_reviews.author: A. S. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Very Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I liked how they came shipped and slowly expanded. Put them in the dryer after they puffed up like the instructions directed. They came out even bigger. I have not had them long enough to clean them. But will follow instructions when the time comes. I tend to wake up a lot during the night and generally flip it over to get a fresh side. I like that they are big and have not removed any stuffing, as I am a back and side sleeper. Very happy with them for now and seem to not have neck pain when waking. Now looking for a bigger set of pillow cases as they do not fit into my regular set.
customer_reviews.author: tjk

customer_reviews.title: Love or Hate type of pillow.
customer_reviews.text: I really love these pillows, they support my finicky daily changing wants in a pillow. However I have also had multiple other family members stay and use them. I always have 2 sets of pillows on my bed, One set of these and another set of normal thicker soft hotel quality foam pillows. My family members take these off the bed when they stay. Myself, I keep and sleep with only one of these. Adjust it to my desired thickness for the night(changes every night) and off to sleep I go. Liked them so much I bought a set for the guest bedroom also. Since when I host I give company my master suite.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Henson

customer_reviews.title: Woke up Pain Free!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical of another memory foam pillow but purchased this one because it was 'adjustable'. I didn't even need to change the fill level, they were perfect out of the package! If you lay sleep on your belly or use them to lay on while reading, they do go flat. But when sleeping, they conform to my head and neck and stay full all night. During the day, they poof back up so I have a fresh experience each night. I'm also a hot sleeper, but these haven't gotten hot yet!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly HAYS

customer_reviews.title: Finally we have pillows we love!
customer_reviews.text: We searched for years for new pillows that weren't too flat or too full. Both my husband and I were able to add or subtract the amount of stuffing we wanted, so we ended up with two perfect pillows. We love the quilted cover as it's easy to wash and is thick enough to keep the inside pillowcase clean. We didn't have any issues with smell, they are not hot, and we the stuffing hasn't flattened, even after 9 months of use. We love them!
customer_reviews.author: M. B.

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable, but not supportive
customer_reviews.text: These just don’t work for my husband and me. There’s no way to keep the pillow under your neck firm enough for support. We both wake with neck pain and the stiffness increases through the day. Two nights on these pillows was all we could stand. I should have known when they arrived completely compressed that they wouldn’t be supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Silver Baring-Gould

customer_reviews.title: My search is over!
customer_reviews.text: For the last 15 years I have tried pillow after pillow searching for one that I love. I bought two different sizes of the my pillow and I hated them both. My head felt cradled gently by.....and this sounds weird but it was like soft putty that formed to me. Supportive and cool too. It wasn't at all like the my pillow experience where I heard noises and felt like I was on a bouncy thing. I love that I can remove or add fill. That's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Hopeful

customer_reviews.title: Not fluffing up properly
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this brand in the past and this time around, the pillows just aren't fluffing/firming up fully. the actual pillowcase is still showing wrinkles where it should have expanded and the pillow itself is very soft and not dense, even after taking a spin in the dryer (on recommendation from the packaging). I'm leaving this at a 3 star because one of the two did eventually firm up some (not as much as past sets, but significantly better), but the other did not.
customer_reviews.author: Andry S.T.

customer_reviews.title: I appreciate the commodity of been able to adjust the firmness
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pillows for my teenage kids. My oldest child likes low pillows and my youngest almost sleeps sitting up. UPDATE: After only a week of having these pillows the inseam on the zipper was coming undone, when I checked the stitching it had only a single stitching with a very thin thread, that was obviously not enough or it wasn't very tight stitched. customer_reviews.author: Juan Salazarfamily4

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for such great pillows.

Comfort, support, softness, and no worry of allergy to any down. First night sleeping on one I noticed I no longer had pain in my shoulder when sleeping on my side. I have been shopping for the perfect pillow and this is it.

Pillows are comfortable, supportive and I think the best characteristic is adjustable. If you are wondering whether or not to continue shopping...stop. Buy these pillows.
